Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 715 Filed 07/12/22 Page 8 of 8
The Honorable Alison J. Nathan
December 6, 2021
Page 8
CONCLUSION
This Court should restrict Examiner Flatley's testimony to the fact-based narrative originally disclosed in the September 15 letter and preclude him from testifying to any expert opinions first disclosed in the November 26 letter or the December 3 or 5 emails.
Respectfully submitted,
Jeffrey S. Pagliuca
Laura A. Menninger
HADDON, MORGAN & FOREMAN P.C.

Denver, CO 80203
Phone: 303-831-7364

cc: Counsel of record (via email)
